projects.title: gazettE - Local News
projects.copy: gazettE is a web app that allows users to see all headlines from our major news outlets. The aim of the site is to offer a fresh and beautiful look of local news, so that we can have a more informed nation.

projects.title: WhereDPump Website & App
projects.copy: WhereDPump is a technology company that facilitates users through a mobile app, allowing them to see all upcoming events and take actions such as purchasing tickets and getting listed for clubs.

projects.title: YUP Life Website
projects.copy: YUP Life is an entertainment company that throws some of the most popular events in Trinidad including Festival of Colour and Backyard Melee. They required a website that would allow patrons to see their upcoming events as well as see event photos.

projects.title: Made By Mei Online Shop
projects.copy: Meiling is an upcoming designer coming out of Trinidad & Tobago. She required a wesbite that would allow users to view and purchase her Monday Wear designs via Cash or Credit Card payment methods

projects.title: Color Me Jouvert Website
projects.copy: Color Me Jouvert required an online web presence that allowed users to see their band's media, info and packages. An online registration system was also implemented so that a patron can sign up at their own convenience.

projects.title: Foodie Buddy Web App
projects.copy: Foodie Buddy is a web app that was designed to display the restaurants and menus partaking in Trinidad & Tobago Restaurant week. The web app is to be expanded to showcase menus of all restaurants all year long.

projects.title: 51 Degrees Website
projects.copy: Though it was not officially launched, this wesbite gave me a lot of insight into exactly what the patrons of the club need. I am currently working on a mobile app for the club. Be on the lookout ;)
